summary: This is an internal email chain from August 16, 2019, regarding the establishment of two special project numbers for charges associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It indicates financial tracking for an 'After Action Team' and other regional costs following Epstein's death.

events.title: Establishment of Epstein-related project numbers
events.description: Internal communication regarding the creation of two special project numbers to track charges associated with Jeffrey Epstein. One is for an 'After Action Team' and the other for all other regional costs.

keyFacts: Two special project numbers were created on August 16, 2019, to track financial charges associated with Jeffrey Epstein.
One project number was designated for an 'After Action Team' under a Regional Director from the Southeast, monitored by a Regional Comptroller.
The second project number was for all other costs associated with the sender's region.
The document is a forwarded internal email chain, indicating administrative and financial procedures following Epstein's death.
